enchantment.extended-enchanting.brimston: Grants speed and health regeneration when on fire in the Nether.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.combusti: Grants increased protection to fire and explosion damage.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.dual_str: Attack a secondary target with each hit.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.feint.de: Jump back after striking a target.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.frost_as: Partially freezes the target on hit.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.glass.de: Deal increased damage when on full health.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.initiati: Deal increased damage to full health targets.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.launch.d: Launches the target in the air on hit.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.leeching: Heals the user when critically striking a target.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.lightnin: Build up static charge on struck targets.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.moon_hea: Prevents phantom spawns and inflicts slowness on attackers when exposed to moonlight.
Gain strength and speed after killing an enemy.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.replanti: Replants crops that are broken with a hoe.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.soil_wal: Prevents you from converting farmland into dirt when landing on it.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.solitude: Deal more damage when this is the only enchantment on the item.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.sun_hear: Grants health over time and ignites attackers when exposed to sunlight.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.void_hea: Saves you from fall damage and the void when in the End.
enchantment.extended-enchanting.weapon_p: Grants increased protection against attackers wielding melee weapons.
